name: Lemon Meringue
description: Lemon Meringue by Exotic Genetix is a sweet, zestful cross of Lemon Skunk and Cookies and Cream. This pungent combo emits a variety of aromas including citrus, diesel, and nuttiness, but at the center of this bouquet is a tart slice of lemon meringue pie with a fat dollop of whipped cream on top. Lemon Meringue offers uplifting mental effects and sativa-driven energy that encourages physical activity. This strain’s subtle motivational qualities and pleasant euphoria make it a go-to for folks combating fatigue, depression, and minor headaches.
descriptionPlain: Lemon Meringue by Exotic Genetix is a sweet, zestful cross of Lemon Skunk and Cookies and Cream. This pungent combo emits a variety of aromas including citrus, diesel, and nuttiness, but at the center of this bouquet is a tart slice of lemon meringue pie with a fat dollop of whipped cream on top. Lemon Meringue offers uplifting mental effects and sativa-driven energy that encourages physical activity. This strain’s subtle motivational qualities and pleasant euphoria make it a go-to for folks combating fatigue, depression, and minor headaches.

highlightedReviews.text: Lemon meringue has an amazing lemony citrus smell with a hint of diesel. Lots of crystals and orange hairs. It hits fairly smooth with a sort of creamy earthy aftertaste. It immediately helped soothe anxiety and nausea, and you can feel the pressure release behind the eyes. If I'm in a lot of discomfort from a migraine or nausea, when the relief comes, it's like a huge weight is lifted off me and I find myself finally relaxing. Just a quick little reboot before the more energizing and focused sativa effects kick in. Nice daytime strain.

The bud smells just like lemons with a hint of nutty aromas. As far as medical effects go, I love this bud for the energy boost and knock down on my depression. However, I feel this bud doesn't help with my bipolar disorder like other strains I've smoked before. Overall this is some great bud to smoke in the morning for that  "pick me up" kind of attitude.
